video_prompt: A fluffy ginger kitten, nestled in a pile of shimmering gold coins, slowly glances around. Its tiny smile subtly widens as individual coins subtly shift and fall around it. Faint glowing motes drift past, hinting at a gentle breeze, their trails blurring as they ascend. The background deepens and lightens, subtly emphasizing the kitten's focused attention on its surroundings.
image_prompt: Fluffy ginger kitten, sitting on a shimmering pile of gold coins. Warm, golden-orange fur, big captivating eyes, sweet innocent expression. Scattered glowing specks and golden spheres in the dark background. Rich, metallic sheen on coins. Prosperity, cuteness, fantasy art.
refined_video_prompt: The kitten's gaze slowly sweeps its surroundings, its tiny smile gradually widening. Individual coins subtly shift and tumble. Faint, glowing motes drift past, their trails blurring as they ascend. The background dynamically deepens and lightens, subtly emphasizing the kitten's shifting attention.
